author: Simon Difford
description: A wonderfully refreshing drink on a summer's day with surprisingly subtle flavours.
name: Chiclet Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND ingredients with a 12oz scoop of crushed ice and serve in large chilled glass
